text: Anyone have any favorite js libraries for data visualization like chart.js ?
I’ve been using highchart for a while, it’s always met my needs
I’ve been comparing that to chart.js… Have you had any experience with the other?
I’ve only played with D3. I really like it for interactive stuff. If you are manipulating >5000 lines of data it starts to lose its viability because it works primarily with CSS

Hi, i'm having a problem with my blog page, i am combining multiple blogs in single page, one issue is coming like when i open up blog page, currently it have around 150 listings of blog on single page, and it takes around 45 second in loading, is there any way to reduce loading time? Page link; <https://www.selworthy.com/blog>
probably shouldn't load that many posts at a time. instead load 10 or so and use fetch/ajax to load the next page for a similar experience
in addition to that, lazy loading the images below the fold would be the next thing to tackle.

i implemented pagination to load 12 post per page - <https://www.selworthy.com/blog>
But when page loaded first time it takes same time on loading of all post, after when user click on pagination it works fine in loading next page post.
how can we load post via ajax - i am currently combining multiple blog categories post on a single page using {% set all_posts = (blog_one_posts + blog_two_posts + blog_three_posts) | sort(true, false, 'publish_date')  %}
And after i am using for loop for it
